citation: Proclamation under the Climate Change (State Action) Act 2008 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Climate Change (State Action) Act 2008

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Climate Change (State Action) Act 2008 fix 1 December 2008 as the day on which that Act commences.

10 November 2008

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

DAVID BARTLETT

Premier

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 November 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
